verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%>, O <S%H339>islands<s%>, unto <S%H7181>me<s%>; and listen, you <S%H3816>people<s%>, from <S%H7350>far<s%>; The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%>; from the <S%H4578>bowels<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> has he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And he has <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>; in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%> has he <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>, and made me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft<s%>; in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> has he hid <S%H5641>me<s%>;
And <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5650>me<s%>, You are my servant, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in whom I will be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H3021>labored<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>nothing<s%>, and in <S%H1892>vain<s%>: yet <S%H403>surely<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and my <S%H6468>work<s%> with my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H559>now<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3478>him<s%>, Though Israel be not <S%H622>gathered<s%>, yet shall I be <S%H3513>glorious<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%> shall be my <S%H5797>strength<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> that you should be my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5341>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, that you may be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>, to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despises<s%>, to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhors<s%>, to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers<s%>, <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H8269>princes<s%> also shall <S%H7812>worship<s%>, because of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that is <S%H539>faithful<s%>, and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he shall choose <S%H977>you<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, In a <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>heard<s%> <S%H3117>you<s%>, and in a day of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5341>you<s%>: and I will preserve <S%H5414>you<s%>, and give you for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to cause to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritages<s%>;

That you may <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H631>prisoners<s%>, Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; to them that are in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, <S%H1540>Show<s%> <S%H7462>yourselves<s%>. They shall feed in the <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and their <S%H4830>pastures<s%> shall be in all high <S%H8205>places<s%>.

They shall not <S%H7456>hunger<s%> nor <S%H6770>thirst<s%>; neither shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> nor <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H7355>them<s%>: for he that has mercy on them shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H4002>them<s%>, even by the springs of <S%H4325>water<s%> shall he guide <S%H5095>them<s%>.
And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%>, and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
<S%H935>Behold<s%>, these shall come from <S%H7350>far<s%>: <S%H6828>and<s%>, behold, these from the north and from the <S%H3220>west<s%>; and these from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim<s%>.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%>, O <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and be <S%H1523>joyful<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>; and break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon his <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H136>me<s%>, and my Lord has forgotten <S%H7911>me<s%>.

Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her sucking <S%H5764>child<s%>, that she should not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb<s%>? <S%H7911>Yes<s%>, they may forget, yet will I not forget <S%H7911>you<s%>.
<S%H2710>Behold<s%>, I have engraved you upon the palms of my <S%H3709>hands<s%>; your <S%H2346>walls<s%> are continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall make <S%H4116>haste<s%>; your <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and they that made you <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall go forth from <S%H3318>you<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%>: all these gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2416>you<s%>. As I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you shall surely <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with them <S%H5716>all<s%>, as with a ornament, and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them on <S%H3618>you<s%>, as a bride does.

For your <S%H2723>waste<s%> and your desolate <S%H8074>places<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H2035>destruction<s%>, shall even now be too <S%H3334>narrow<s%> by reason of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%>, and they that swallowed you <S%H1104>up<s%> shall be far <S%H7368>away<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> which you shall <S%H7923>have<s%>, after you have lost the <S%H559>other<s%>, shall say again in your <S%H241>ears<s%>, The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>narrow<s%> for <S%H5066>me<s%>: give <S%H4725>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>live<s%>.

Then shall you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Who has <S%H3205>fathered<s%> for me <S%H7921>these<s%>, seeing I have lost my sons, and am <S%H1565>desolate<s%>, a <S%H1540>captive<s%>, and wandering back and <S%H5493>forth<s%>? and who has brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H7604>these<s%>? Behold, I was left <S%H375>alone<s%>; these, where had they been?

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, <S%H5375>Behold<s%>, I will lift up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, and set <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H5251>standard<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>arms<s%>, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be your nursing <S%H539>fathers<s%>, and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> your nursing <S%H3243>mothers<s%>: they shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to you with their <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and lick <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for they shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> that wait for <S%H6960>me<s%>.
Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, or the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H4422>delivered<s%>?

But thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, Even the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be taken <S%H3947>away<s%>, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>: for I will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with him that <S%H3401>contends<s%> with <S%H3467>you<s%>, and I will save your <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them that <S%H3238>oppress<s%> you with their own <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and they shall be <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood<s%>, as with sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%>: and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> am your <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
